sentences.sContent: We'll manage somehow, you and me. I know we will.
sentences.sCn: 我们总会应付过去的，你和我。我知道我们会的。

sentences.sContent: Somehow Karin managed to cope with the demands of her career.
sentences.sCn: 不知怎么地，卡林设法应付了那些来自工作的要求。

synos.tran: 以某种方法；莫明其妙地

phrases.pCn: 设法，想办法；莫名其妙地；以某种方法
不知道什么原因你就会做到（歌词）

trans.tranOther: You use somehow to say that you do not know or cannot say how something was done or will be done
